criterion: Provides clear and concise information about the importance of unifying practice guidelines for stroke prevention
Falsely claims that there is no consensus on the optimal duration of antiplatelet therapy
Asks for clarification on the specific questions the user wants to ask about the topic
Uses technical jargon and complex medical terminology without explanation

States that there is no evidence of a specific antiplatelet therapy being more effective than others

Lacks a clear and concise summary of the main findings
Provides a detailed analysis of the studies comparing different antiplatelet therapies for stroke prevention
